00033 RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenu::gsMainMenu()
00034                                  :gsMenuBase(){
00035 
00036   LOGI("Constructing a gsMainMenu");
00037   velocity=new vcConstant();
00038   translateTo(0.0f);
00039 }

00044 RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenu::~gsMainMenu(){
00045   if (velocity){
00046     delete velocity;
00047     velocity=NULL;
00048   }
00049 }

00061   // Do notGuiManager::beginGuiFadeIn
00062   //  GuiManager::getSingleton().beginGuiFadeIn();

00065   setupMainMenu();
00066   LOGI("gsMainMenu initialization complete");
00067 
00068 }

00111 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenu::
00112 onNetworkGameClicked(const CEGUI::EventArgs& evt){
00113   LOGI("NetworkGame button clicked");
00114 
00115   GuiManager::getSingleton().beginGuiFadeOut();
00116 
00117   // We must wait for the CEGUI fade end to prevent
00118   // SEGFAULT in access to CEGUI windows (getAlpha())
00119   while (GuiManager::getSingleton().isInGuiFadeOut()){
00120     Ogre::Root::getSingleton().renderOneFrame();
00121   }
00122 
00123   GuiManager::getSingleton().removeCurrentCEGUILayout();
00124   GuiManager::getSingleton().loadCEGUILayout("connection.layout");
00125   GuiManager::getSingleton().debugChild("RainbruRPG/Connection");
00126 
00127   GuiManager::getSingleton().beginGuiFadeIn();
00128 
00129   // Subscribe event
00130   CEGUI::Window* root=CEGUI::System::getSingleton().getGUISheet();
00131 
00132   // Back button
00133   CEGUI::Window* btnBack=root->getChild("Back");
00134   if (btnBack){
00135     btnBack->setFont("Iconified-20");
00136     btnBack->subscribeEvent("Clicked", 
00137       CEGUI::Event::Subscriber(&gsMainMenu::onBackToMainClicked,this));
00138 
00139   }
00140   else{
00141     LOGW("Cannot get the 'Back' button");
00142   }
00143 
00144   // Get the Connection window
00145   CEGUI::Window* connectWin=root->getChild("RainbruRPG/Connection");
00146 
00147  // Connect button
00148   CEGUI::Window* btnConnect=connectWin->getChild("Connect");
00149   if (btnConnect){
00150     btnConnect->subscribeEvent("Clicked", 
00151       CEGUI::Event::Subscriber(&gsMainMenu::onConnectClicked,this));
00152 
00153   }
00154   else{
00155     LOGW("Cannot get the 'Back' button");
00156   }
00157 
00158 
00159   return true;
00160 }
00161 
00169 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenu::
00170 onBackToMainClicked(const CEGUI::EventArgs& evt){
00171 
00172   GuiManager::getSingleton().beginGuiFadeOut();
00173 
00174   // We must wait for the CEGUI fade end to prevent
00175   // SEGFAULT in access to CEGUI windows (getAlpha())
00176   while (GuiManager::getSingleton().isInGuiFadeOut()){
00177     Ogre::Root::getSingleton().renderOneFrame();
00178   }
00179 
00180   GuiManager::getSingleton().removeCurrentCEGUILayout();
00181 
00182   GuiManager::getSingleton().loadCEGUILayout("mainmenu.layout");
00183   GuiManager::getSingleton().beginGuiFadeIn();
00184 
00185   setupMainMenu();
00186 
00187   return true;
00188 }

00199 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenu::setupMainMenu(){
00200   LOGI("setupMainMenu called");
00201   // Subscribe event
00202   CEGUI::Window* root=CEGUI::System::getSingleton().getGUISheet()
00203 ->getChild("RainbruRPG/MainMenu");;
00204 
00205   // Quit button
00206   CEGUI::Window* btnQuit=root->getChild("Quit");
00207   if (btnQuit){
00208     //    btnQuit->setFont("Iconified-20");
00209     btnQuit->subscribeEvent("Clicked", 
00210              CEGUI::Event::Subscriber(&gsMainMenu::onQuitClicked,this));
00211 
00212   }
00213   else{
00214     LOGW("Cannot get the 'Quit' button");
00215   }
00216 
00217 
00218   // Local test
00219   CEGUI::Window* btnLocalTest=root->getChild("LocalTest");
00220   if (btnLocalTest){
00221     //    btnLocalTest->setFont("Iconified-20");
00222     btnLocalTest->subscribeEvent("Clicked", 
00223              CEGUI::Event::Subscriber(&gsMainMenu::onLocalTestClicked,
00224                                       this));
00225   }
00226   else{
00227     LOGW("Cannot get the 'Quit' button");
00228   }
00229 
00230   // Network game
00231   CEGUI::Window* btnNetGame=root->getChild("NetGame");
00232   if (btnNetGame){
00233     //    btnNetGame->setFont("Iconified-20");
00234     btnNetGame->subscribeEvent("Clicked", 
00235              CEGUI::Event::Subscriber(&gsMainMenu::onNetworkGameClicked,
00236                                       this));
00237   }
00238   else{
00239     LOGW("Cannot get the 'Network game' button");
00240   }
00241 
00242 }

00251 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenu::
00252 onConnectClicked(const CEGUI::EventArgs& evt){
00253   LOGI("Connect button clicked");
00254 
00255   // Get the strings
00256   CEGUI::Window* root=CEGUI::System::getSingleton().getGUISheet();
00257   CEGUI::Window* connectWin=root->getChild("RainbruRPG/Connection");
00258   CEGUI::Window* name=connectWin->getChild("RainbruRPG/Connection/Name");
00259   CEGUI::Window* pwd=connectWin->getChild("RainbruRPG/Connection/Pwd");
00260   const char* cName=name->getText().c_str();
00261   const char* cPwd=pwd->getText().c_str();
00262   LOGCATS("Name :");
00263   LOGCATS(cName);
00264   LOGCATS("Pwd :");
00265   LOGCATS(cPwd);
00266   LOGCAT();
00267 
00268   HashPassword hp;
00269 
00270   std::string hashPwd=hp.encryptString(cPwd);
00271   GameEngine::getSingleton().connectUser(cName, hashPwd.c_str());
00272 
00273   return true;
00274 }
